title: The Favorites - Preakness and MLB Betting Update
itunes:title: The Favorites - Preakness and MLB Betting Update
description:
The second leg of horse racing's Triple Crown is this Saturday with the 147th Preakness Stakes in Baltimore, Maryland. Action Network senior writer Sean Zerillo joins his boss Chad Millman and pro gambler Simon Hunter to discuss betting on the race from every angle.

Later, they dive into Sean's real passion: Major League Baseball. Simon peppers Sean with loads of questions about the season thus far,  including dead balls, run totals, and fading the New York Yankees. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
